Our Story

Since its inception in 2000, TechInsight has been involved with large and small-scale IT projects throughout Canada and the US. Our clients have come from many different industries, including computer software, manufacturing, utilities, agriculture, transportation, communications, municipalities and petrochemical.

SAP

TechInsight has participated in four full SAP implementations, including S4/HANA. We have provided technical and functional consulting on all the major SAP modules throughout all project phases and post-project support.

Services

TechInsight provides expert services in the areas of SAP Human Capital Management and Payroll. The company has been a major player in 3 SAP Payroll and HR implementations in Canada and the US.

SAP Enterprise Asset Management (EAM) also figures prominently in the companyâ€™s resume. TechInsight has provided technical expertise in this area on several related projects.

TechInsight can also provide consulting in Java/JavaScript and Web Design.
